content.text: I enjoy fishing, hiking, and crafting. What about you?
My hobbies include watching videos of surgery, and making cheesecake.
Interesting! I've never seen a surgery video. I'm not much of a fan of blood.
I know what you mean. Sometimes it can be a bit gruesome. But it's also fascinating to see how the human body works.
I guess I can see that. I've always been more interested in animals, so I like to watch videos of animals instead.
That's cool. I love animals too! I have a dog named Buddy.
That's awesome! I have a cat named Mittens.
I love cats too! They're so cute and cuddly.
They sure are! I'm glad we agree on something.
